overview: Piper is about to marry Brad – and have they become the couple of the year! The only problem is there’s so much coupling going on, you need a scorecard to keep track of the players. Piper is hot for her bridesmaid, Lucky, and Mike, the best man. Brad, meanwhile, is at it with Piper’s mother and helping out Marvin, the caterer, with keeping Muffy, the maid of honor, satisfied. Marvin is also spreading the cheer to Lucy in a midnight bathroom tryst.
title: A Stroke at Midnight
